name: Myne Factory - Ascendance Of A Bookworm
description:
Ascendance Of A Bookworm

Authors: Juusoz, Tylenol, Goldkoron and Expl0dingCat

Feel free to join our Discord community for updates on current models or models on other shows.

Prompt Format

The prompts we trained on are available in the corresponding T{version} prompt list.txt file.

T3.2 Prompt list.txt

Format: Parent tag, description prompt 1, description prompt 2, etc;

The parent tag serves as the primary label for the overall theme of the image and acts as the main subject. The description prompts are a comprehensive list of attributes, objects, actions, and other elements that describe the subject in detail. Each subject is separated by a semicolon (;) while the individual attributes, objects, actions, and elements are separated by a comma (,).

Example:

Positive prompts: MFB Style; 1boy; 1girl; Lutz; Myne, poor, yellow eyes, blue hair, hairstick; (masterpiece); detailed; reflective; depth of field; 8k; photo;

Negative prompts: (bad hands, error), bad anatomy, low quality, worst quality, watermark, signature, poorly drawn face, noise, grain, nude, naked, upskirt, blind, AOB Style, solo

Just because we haven’t trained on something doesn’t mean the base AI model doesn’t already know what it is, so go crazy.

Style tags:

You can specify what style the image should generate in using the following tags.

MyneFactoryBase style, for more artistic pictures MFB Style

Ascendance of a Bookworm style, for more anime accurate pictures AOB Style

Recommended Settings

  • Sampling Steps 40

  • Sampler DPM++ SDE Karras

  • Image Size At least 768x768

  • CFG 7

  • Clip skip 1 (settings, Clip skip)

Socials

Website | Discord | Patreon | CivitAI
